title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 180 - Juvenile Detention Facilities Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 180 - Juvenile Detention Facilities Regulations

State Regulations

Subpart 180-1 - Juvenile Detention Facilities Regulations (§ 180-1.1 to 180-1.21)

Subpart 180-3 - Specialized Secure Detention Facilities (§ 180-3.1 to 180-3.32)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 180

Amended

New

York State Register July 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 30, eff. 7/25/2018

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 19-G, §§
500[2], 501[9], 510-a, 530; Family Court Act, § 304.1[2]; Social Services

Law, §§ 20[3][d], 34[3][f], 462[2]; L. 1990, ch. 53; L. 1997, ch. 436; L. 2008, ch. 323, § 19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
